name: Dungeon of Horror
description:
Dark ancient dungeons can be scary. Nonetheless, one brave girl tries to discover all hidden places to find the story of this frightening place.

Dungeon of Horror - a 2D-pixel dungeon labyrinth, where you play as a girl trying to find the way out and discover all the dark corners of this frightening place. Watch your steps, avoid traps, collect all loot and escape the dungeon!

Game Features:
- Visual style
- 2D Pixel world
- Horror elements
